author: 4 Ever Green
description:
Some animals don’t rely on teeth to survive. Their real power starts after the mouth opens.
From tongues that fire venom like a weapon to ones that scrape meat off bone or lure prey straight into a trap nature has turned this simple muscle into something terrifying.
These are the most dangerous and unbelievable tongues ever evolved.
title: Deadliest Tongues and Mouths Used as Living Weapons
